c1.name: Infinite Circuit
c1.effect:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

c2.name: Electromagnetic Field
c2.effect:
Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
- Increases DEF by 25%.
- Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

c3.name: Resonant Thunder
c3.effect: Increases the level of Lightning Rose by 3. The maximum level upgrade is 15.

c4.name: Plasma Eruption
c4.effect: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

c5.name: Electrocute
c5.effect: Increases the level of Violet Arc by 3. The maximum level upgrade is 15.

c6.name: Pulsating Witch
c6.effect:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Shocked status onto nearby enemies.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.
